long_description: The Scott Aspect 660 hardtail mountain bike is ready to usher you into the fun of mountain biking with a shock-absorbent front fork and Shimano parts for reliable performance. Double-butted 6061 aluminum frame offers great handling and responsiveness; replaceable rear derailleur hanger helps extend usable life of frame. Suntour XCM-HLO fork meets rought trails with 100mm of travel to buffer rough trails; fork can be locked out for efficient climbing. Shimano shifters and derailleurs snap through the 24 gear combinations for quick, precise shifts. Araya rims and Impac Ridgepac tires provide a smooth-rolling, grippy ride on varying terrain. Specs on the Scott Aspect 660 hardtail mountain bike are subject to change.
